roleset.name: call

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Big Board stock specialists]-1, in a bold palace revolt, began shortly after Oct. 13 *trace*-1 to telephone the corporate executives of the companies whose stock is listed on the Big Board to have them pressure the exchange to ban program trading.
example.arg: the corporate executives of the companies whose stock is listed on the Big Board
to have them pressure the exchange to ban program trading

roleset.note: Member of Vncls instr_communication-37.4. Comparison to 'call'.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'telephone' based on sentence in financial subcorpus.
